Lotz, Johannes Baptist Lotz; LCAuth identifier: n50042421; VIAF identifier: 108945376; GND identifier: 118729217; ISNI (P213): 0000000110323258; place of birth: Darmstadt; place of death: Munich; country of citizenship: Germany; instance of: human; date of birth: +1903-08-02T00:00:00Z; date of death: +1992-06-03T00:00:00Z; employer: Pontifical Gregorian University, Munich School of Philosophy; given name: Johannes; NTA identifier (Netherlands): 068229801; occupation: philosopher, university teacher; religious order: Society of Jesus; religion: Catholicism; SHARE Catalogue author ID (P3987): 160417; languages spoken or published: German; FAST-ID: 14587; Angelicum author ID (P5731): 24677; SUDOC authorities: 02840470X; BnF identifier: 120246265; sex or gender: male; CONOR identifier: 92842083; NKC identifier: jn20000603800; PUSC author ID (P5739): 47893; NUKAT authorities: n93090126; National Library of Korea Identifier (P5034): KAC2018H5183; description/label: deutscher Philosoph, Duits filosoof , fealsamh Gearmánach, filòsof alemany, filosof german, filósofo alemán, filosofo tedesco, filozof gjerman, German philosopher, philosophe allemand, professor académico alemão, Saksamaa filosoof, tysk professor, פילוסוף גרמני, فيلسوف ألماني)
